text: Charles "Woody" Burton (born June 11, 1945) is an American politician. He is a member of the Indiana House of Representatives from the 58th District, serving since 1988. He is a member of the Republican party. Burton served on the Johnson County Council from 1980 to 1984. His brother is former Congressman Dan Burton. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Indiana House of Representatives Category:Indiana Republicans Category:21st- century American politicians Category:1945 births Category:Politicians from Indianapolis
title: Woody Burton
